snippet: Wayne Rooney told Alex Ferguson he wanted a transfer before Ferguson’s retirement in May, but Manchester United’s new manager, David Moyes, said Rooney was not going anywhere.
abstract: Manchester United manager David Moyes says striker Wayne Rooney is not going anywhere; Rooney, frustrated after being substituted in key matches, told previous manager Alex Ferguson that he wanted transfer.
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney told Alex Ferguson he wanted a transfer before Ferguson’s retirement in May, but Manchester United’s new manager, David Moyes, said Rooney was not going anywhere.

headline.main: Rooney Not Leaving, Manchester United Manager Says
